## KARMA research

KARMA is a research unit in the [Computer Science department](https://cs.vu.nl/en/index.aspx) at the Vrije Universiteit of Amsterdam.
Lead by [Jacopo Urbani](http://www.jacopourbani.it/), it focuses on scalable Knowledge Acquisition, Reasoning, and Management.

### Selected Projects

* [Trident](https://github.com/karmaresearch/trident), a column-based triplestore
* [Vlog](https://github.com/karmaresearch/vlog), a datalog reasoning engine based on Trident
* [Laser](https://github.com/karmaresearch/Laser) (Python) and its port [Laser++](https://github.com/karmaresearch/laser-plus-plus) (C++), a stream reasoning engine based on the LARS logic framework.
